name: Norsk Bergindustri/Norwegian Mineral Industry
goal: Norwegian Mineral industry is an association which is open for membership from companies that prospect for, use, manage or process mineral resources in Norway or companies that are otherwise related to this industry, such as various types of suppliers.  Our purpose is to promote the interests of our members and to make these known to decisionmakers and stakeholders.
euInitiatives: Raw Materials Initiative, Raw Materials Supply Group, European minerals policy
